subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Cognate with {{m|ja|坪|tr=tsubo}}. Likely shares its origin with {{m|ja|粒|tr=tsubu}}, in expressing the idea of something round and bulging outward.

subSections.title: Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: In acupuncture and acupressure contexts, this word is most often spelled either in [[hiragana]] as {{l|ja|つぼ}} or in [[katakana]] as {{l|ja|ツボ}}.
